short_summary: The full Request for Information(RFI) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account and you have filled out your Government of Canada profile.
description: The RFI and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded from a SAP Ariba account with a Government of Canada profile
full_summary:
## Request for Information for the Administration of the CAF Relocation Program
### Request for Information (RFI) Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4220255020-Doc4235355341
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4220255020
* **Publication Date**: 2023-09-29
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 18, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Program Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking expressions of interest to administer the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) Relocation Program. 

### Vendor Requirements

The successful proponent will provide relocation services and support to the CAF, with the requirements outlined in the attached Request for Information (RFI).

### Solicitation Procedure

This solicitation is being conducted under the Canada Buys online procurement tool. To access the RFI and participate in this solicitation, vendors must be registered and logged in to their SAP Ariba account.

* **Vendor Registration**: Vendors new to PSPC's online procurement tool should consult the Canada Buys Getting Started page, which provides a registration checklist and step-by-step instructions on how to create an account.
* **Technical Support**: For technical support with SAP Ariba, please contact the Canada Buys Service Desk agents at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/contact-support](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/contact-support)

### Procurement Details

The procurement method for this solicitation is competitive with open bidding. The selection criteria for the successful proponent include a highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: September 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 18, 2023, 14:00:00

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Dominic Carrière
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

Email: [dominic.carriere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dominic.carriere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please note that the contact information provided is for informational purposes only. Vendors must follow the solicitation process and register with SAP Ariba to access the RFI and participate in this solicitation.  Canada Buys Information for vendors can be found in the attachments or [ canada Buys Website ][https://canadabuys.can
